project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that provides self-service onboarding, knowledge management, and usage analytics for customers of the main SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklists accurately reflect the customer's subscription level
Customers can track their onboarding progress

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to enable seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily find and access relevant product documentation

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Customers can clearly see their product usage and adoption trends

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily reach out to their CSM with relevant details

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> Web App -> Backend API -> External Systems -> Response to Web App
security_considerations: Implement rate limiting and DDoS protection

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP within 6 months.
deliverables: Integrated with CRM and Knowledge Base

implementation_phases.description: Implement the Adoption Metrics Dashboard feature.

risk_analysis.description: Delays in third-party system integrations (CRM, Knowledge Base, Analytics)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Start integration planning and development early, maintain close communication with third-party vendors

risk_analysis.description: Underestimation of development effort for complex features (e.g., Personalized Onboarding Checklists)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct thorough technical analysis, involve senior engineers in planning, build in buffer time

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in meeting performance and scalability requirements
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement performance testing early, optimize code and infrastructure, use caching and load balancing strategies

risk_analysis.description: Insufficient budget to complete all planned features
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features based on business value, explore cost-saving measures, seek additional funding if necessary

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal

metadata.source_brd: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP) BRD
